"Partner's!" Sinesis says. He starts to think.

"Think Rampage will want us=
 on his side?" Sinesis asks Twister.

Sinister starts toward the Maximal ba=
se while holding Blizzard's hand...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 20=
00 6:38 PM
  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


  Blizzard/Twister

=

  *Blizzard sighs and keeps walking but looks behind her and than doesn't =
anymore*



  Twister: Your right. It's not like she was going to let me st=
ay anyway.

  *Twister stands up*

  Twister: I think we start looking now.=
 The sooner the better. Partners?

  *Twister says to Sinesis while holding=
 her fist out for him to hit his on*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
 From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, =
2000 5:33 PM
    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


    Sinister lis=
tens carefully to the words of Blizzard.

    "Who needs a home, Twister!? =
Let's just go find another team that wants us and we shall be on our way to=
 glory!" Sinesis said to Twister...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
   From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturda=
y, August 05, 2000 6:02 AM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


=
      Blizzard/Twister


      *Blizzard begins walking*

      Blizzard:..=
Who am I kidding...I don't know what to do, I probably eat myself!

      *=
Blizzard says sadly*

      Blizzard: It seems the the whole world is again=
st me accept for you. Even my sister. I know the way she was acting, not no=
rmal.

      *Blizzard says to Sinister and sighs and continues walking*


=

      *Twister looks at Sinesis*

      Twister: It was up to me tell the =
others too but I didn't because I didn't do it before I tried to stop Retro=
flame and I didn't after because I was too concerned with saving myself....=
That was the past and the future can be different but it isn't looking up n=
ow that we have no home...

      *Twister says to Sinesis

        ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
        Subject: Re: The=
 End is Near...........


        "Okay." Sinister said lamely. He walked o=
ff with Blizzard whenever Blizzard walks off.

        Sinesis sighs.
     =
    
        "I always said I never made any mistakes. That I was perfect, =
but once, I was supposed to fight some criminals that had a bounty on them,=
 but I was not to harm anyone else. I killed that criminal for my own selfi=
sh needs, but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could disarm it, but all =
I did was set the time even lower, and some bots didn't have time to get aw=
ay. I managed to get away since I knew about it, but I never told them, so =
that's why I chose the evil path in life, I felt I had done something evil.=
.." Sinesis said...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From:=
 ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturda=
y, August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
          Subject: Re: The End is Near..........=
.


          Twister/Blizzard


          Twister: I was sent on a mission=
 to stop another bot named Retroflame. She planed to blow up some other bot=
s that didn't know a thing because she claimed that they were in her way. I=
 was given no partners for there were none to give. I didn't stop them....I=
 tried but I was shelfish and excaped in a pod thinking of only myself and =
other bots were killed not only because of Retroflame but also because of m=
e....I deserved to be near that bomb.....There were missions before that bu=
t I wish not speak of for I have failed too many.......I wouldn't kill myse=
lf for I would probably be sent back down for the Matrix would not want my =
selfish kind in.......

          *Twister says to Sinesis*


          *Bl=
izzard sighs and looks up again still frowning*

          Blizzard: We nee=
d to find shelter, my love.

          *Blizzard says to Sinister*

       =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
=
            Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


            Sinesis w=
alks to Twister.

            "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me =
of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. S=
inister shook his head.

            "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Strongh=
old and Blender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's m=
isfortune and take a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all=
 the time hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and =
always will be a failure...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
           From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
           Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
              Subject: R=
e: The End is Near...........


              Twister/Blizzard


          =
    *Twister looks at what was left of the base*

              Twister: I =
always be nothing but a failer with nowhere to go...

              *Twiste=
r walks next to the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


 =
             *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

     =
         Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can actually call=
 home.....

              *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

           =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
         =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2=
000 3:10 AM
                Subject: The End is Near...........


         =
       Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled=
 and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She sp=
un around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

         =
       "You do not know when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your=
 an idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't be able to be seen wit=
h a microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagg=
er back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in s=
atisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again=
 turned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, =
but Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everything with fire beams. P=
lintissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn'=
t until now, after her bad life that she discovered her true fighting power=
. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywher=
e as Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw =
blade and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa =
several hundred times. Plintissa fell.

                "Th weak move aside=
 and die so the strong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has alwa=
ys been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend, but=
 don't take this personally, it's just business." Dracona said.
           =
      
                Dracona pulled back the saw blade and thrust it towa=
rds Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and threw it. It hit =
Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as she did, the bla=
de came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracona blinked h=
er eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived on the planet. Th=
e blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces everywhere. Her spark =
extinguished. Her last words were:

                "*Cough, Cough* Zardus =
I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Dracona died smilin=
g. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she would never leav=
e her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got w=
eaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, t=
oo.

                "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa =
whispered.

                "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does ev=
eryone betray me?" Artist asked.

                "Artist, there floats Dra=
cona's spark, recover it, we can't part, she really was my friend." Artist =
walked up and captured the extinguished spark as it tried to fly away. He c=
ontained it in a capsule.

                "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'l=
l...have no more reason to live, all my friends are gone, my helping days a=
re over." Artist said.

                "Your helping days are never over, =
and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.

                "This isn't=
 some lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

         =
       "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team =
Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed=
 by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. =
And there it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks=
 at the base and sighs.

                "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess=
 we have to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sigh=
s.

                "Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister=
 said sadly.

                Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark su=
ddenly burst from her and floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what=
 he needed to do. He opened his chest compartment and his spark was reveale=
d. Artist combined Plintissa's spark with his own, they became one.

      =
          "Till all are one." Artist whispered really low. Plintissa told h=
im she still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, a=
nd now they could never be seperated again. Artist, completely ignoring Bli=
zzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a field.

       =
         "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa s=
aid. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward th=
e Maximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attac=
k anyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up=
 the contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

                "I love you.=
" Artist said seemingly to nobody.

                "I love you too." Plint=
issa said to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...






=
